## ResolutionSession.describeInjection() method

Describe the injection for debugging purpose

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static describeInjection(injection: Readonly<Injection>): {
        targetName: string;
        bindingSelector: import("./binding-filter").BindingSelector<any>;
        metadata: import("./inject").InjectionMetadata;
    };
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  injection | <code>Readonly&lt;Injection&gt;</code> | Injection object |

<b>Returns:</b>

`{

        bindingSelector: import("./binding-filter").BindingSelector<any>;
        metadata: import("./inject").InjectionMetadata;
    }`
